title: GreenDao database android
body:
Plz solve my issue.

I need to get the image on the basis of two tables - User and Stuff.

User table has the author image and its id stored, stuff table also have user id stored in the form of author id. I used onBindView() method to bind rest of the details from Stuff table. But how to get the image of user/author using both tables.

Thanks in advance.
